subject: AI & Agents
title: Spam and Toxicity Detection
description: A short lesson to help you apply Spam and Toxicity Detection.

hook.text: Your comment section is flooded with hate speech and scam links. Filters are your first line.

buildup.text: Content moderation classifies text as safe, spam, toxic, or policy-violating.

discovery.text: Perspective API and custom models score text on toxicity, threat, and profanity dimensions.

twist.text: Adversarial users obfuscate: 'h8te' instead of 'hate,' Unicode tricks, and code-switching.

climax.text: Layer keyword filters, ML classifiers, and human review for robust moderation.

punchline.text: Filter the noise. Protect the community.

quiz.question: How do adversarial users evade toxicity filters?
options: Obfuscating words with misspellings and Unicode tricks
